.mga:B2BTp1SmryRpt.description: Compliance Summary Report to be generated by B2B operators. This report has to be generated daily, 00:00:00 UTC. Filing is automatic following generation. The MGA shall datestamp and hash the report. The difference time between Datestamp and creation date must be less than 15 seconds. Data must be reported in absolute terms. i.e even for players or accounts that have been not active during the period. Test accounts and dummy accounts are to be included in this report.

TtlBtSlpTrSmry.description: Bet Slips transaction summary for the period

anyOf.description: The forex rate for the currency to Euro as published on the report date by the European Central Bank

mga:AccountActivitySummary.description: Summary of a Player Account Activity

TtlBlckd.description: Total Monetary Amount of Money blocked at the end of the period.

TtlCashIn.description: Total Monetary Amount of Cash In that did not result from Gaming activity.

TtlCashOut.description: Total Monetary Amount cash out that was not gaming activity and was not withdrawn. For example buddy transfer to paying of commission fees.

TtlDpst.description: Total Monetary Amount Deposited during period.

TtlFndsInPly.description: Total Funds in Play at the End of the Period.

TtlOpnBlc.description: Total Opening Balance at the start of the period.

TtlUndRun.description: Total Underrun. The Underrun is the excess of the original wager price over the final cost of a wager.

TtlWthdrw.description: Total Monetary Amount Withdrawn during period.

mga:B2BGameTypesMT.description: B2B Game Types as defined in the Gaming Act, Malta

items.description: Document Content. Repeat for every operator

mga:BaseRateEuro.description: The forex rate for the currency to Euro as published on the report date by the European Central Bank

TtlPayOutAmnt.description: Total Monetary Amount paid-out for the period. (Return to player).

TtlSlipAmtPndg.description: Total Monetary Amount pending at the end of the period. (From TtlSlipPndg above).

TtlSlipAmtUncashed.description: Total Monetary Amount in bets slips uncashed at the end of the period. (from TtlSlipUncashed above).

TtlSlipClsd.description: Total Number of bets  slips fully closed during the period. (ie bet slips that have been closed and player paid out).

TtlSlipCncld.description: Total Number of bets  slips cancelled during the period. (ie bet slips that have been invalidated for some reason).

TtlSlipPlyd.description: Total Number of bet slips laid during period. This represents Slips not the total number of Bets. If a bet slip contains multiple singles but a unique bets slip ID then it should be considered as 1 bet slip, otherwise the bets must be the total of seperated  bet slips.

TtlSlipPndg.description: Total Number of bet Slips pending at the end of the period.

TtlSlipUncashed.description: Total Number of bets  slips uncashed at the end of the period. (This applies for non-account wagering only).

TtlStkAmt.description: Total Monetary Amount wagered in Bet Slips for the period (in TtlSlipPlyd above)

TtlReal.description: Total Amount of bets opened based on real  events during the period. Based on open bets

TtlVirtual.description: Total Amount of bets opened based on virtual events during the period. Based on open Bets

TtlBetsClsd.description: Total number of bets closed during the period.

TtlBetsOpn.description: Total Number of bets opened during the period.

TtlBetsPndg.description: Total number of bets pending at the end of the period.

Events.description: Events other than sports or lotteries. (such as weather, election results, TV contests,etc.)

PrdTp.description: Submission Report Period. Report must be periodic.

RprtStrtDt.description: Report Covering Period Start Date and Time.

items.description: List all website that are covered by this report.

RptPrd.description: Report Covering Period is that of 1 report per Day.

mga:JackpotsSummary.description: Information on how a Jackpot Ended

mga:PlayerAccountDetailType1.description: Player Accounts Details listed as at the end of the period. The list must be absolute including test accounts.

AcctSt.description: Account Status at the end of the period. Active, Blocked, Dormant

CtryOfRprt.description: Optional field to indicate the Reporting Country for this account other than Malta.

mga:PlayerAccountDetailType2.description: Player Accounts Details listed as at the end of the period. The list must be absolute including test accounts.

AcctSt.description: Account Status at the end of the period. Active, Blocked, Dormant

CtryOfRprt.description: Optional field to indicate the Reporting Country for this account other than Malta.

mga:PlayerAccountDetailType3.description: Player Accounts Details listed as at the end of the period. The list must be absolute including test accounts.

AcctSt.description: Account Status at the end of the period. Active, Blocked, Dormant

CtryOfRprt.description: Optional field to indicate the Reporting Country for this account other than Malta.

mga:PlayerAcctActivity1.description: Activity Information of a Player's Account

AcctClsDt.description: Account Closed Date if account is Closed.

mga:SportsTypes.description: Major sports on whihc MGA  collects statistical data

TtlGamesPlayed.description: Total number of Games played. Do NOT report games  if not played during period.

VendorID.description: Id for Game Vendor . Optional if the same as Reporting operator

TtlDrop.description: Total Monetary value on Drop on Tables

TtlCoinIn.description: Total Monetary Amount wagered for the period

TtlCoinOut.description: Total Monetary Amount won for the period.

TtlCshblCrdtIn.description: Total Monetary Amount of cashable credits played

TtlCshblCrdtOut.description: Total Monetary Amount of cashable credits won

TtlJckptWon.description: Total Jackpot Monetary Amount won by players

TtlNonCshblCrdtIn.description: Total Monetary Amount of non cashable credits played

TtlNonCshblCrdtOut.description: Total Monetary Amount of non cashable credits won

TtlPending.description: Total Monetary Amount in pending funds in games for the period.

OprId.description: Operator unique Identifier by MT B2C licence

TtlGamePly.description: Total games played during period. Set to 0 if there are no games played for the period.

TtlGamesPlayed.description: Total number of Games played. Do NOT report games  if not played during period.

VendorID.description: Id for Game Vendor . Optional if the same as Reporting operator

OprId.description: Operator unique Identifier by MT B2C licence

Ccy.description: Currency. Can be omitted if game is palyed in Euros.

OprtrID.description: A Unique Identifier for the  Internet Gaming Platform hosting the Player. Operator MAY NOT BE MALTA LICENCED.

Player_ID.description: A Unique Player Identifier as supplied by the Internet Gaming Platform

TtlWgrAmnt.description: Total Wagered Amount in Monetary Value

Tournament.description: Unique Identifier for a Tournament if part of a Tournament Game

TtlPotAmnt.description: Total Pot Amount of games closed during period

TtlRakeAmnt.description: Total Rake Amount of games closed during period

TtlStakeAmnt.description: Total Stake Amount of games closed during period

TtlBuyInAmnt.description: Total amount of Buyins for tournaments closed during period

TtlPrizeAmnt.description: Total amount of Prize for tournaments closed during period

TtlRebuysAmnt.description: Total amount of Rebuys for tournaments closed during period

GameType.description: Sub- type of Type 3 Game. Defaults to Pool Betting

TtlTicketsPlyd.description: Total number of Tickets Played in Pool.

VendorID.description: Id for Game Vendor . Optional if the same as Reporting operator

ClsDt.description: Closing date of Pool Wityhin period

OrgnrOpId.description: The license Number of Operator who orgaized the pool game.

PlGmId.description: A Unique identifier for Pool Game. If the game was a shaared pool then the Id must be the one issued by the Organising Operator.

Shared.description: True if pool was shared with other operators

TtlOperContrib.description: Total Contribution to Operator. This can be different from (TtlStakeAmnt-TtlPrizeAmnt) if the Pool was shared with other  operators

TtlPrizeAmnt.description: Total prize amount awarded in pool games closed during the period.

TtlStakeAmnt.description: Total stake Amount in pool games closed during the period

TtlPoolGamesClsd.description: Total Pool Games closed during period

OprId.description: Operator unique Identifier by MT B2C licence

items.description: Any pooled game with shared liquidity including parimutuel games and bingo.

TtlPGCPlyd.description: Total monetary amount of Promotional Gaming Credits played during period

rri:AddressType2Code.description: Address Types. This Data type is compatible with AdressType2Code of ISO20022.

items.description: Use this field for Social Media accounts such as WeChat, Skype, etc.

anyOf.description: Format for representing monetary values. Should be used only in conjuction of with a Currency element or attribute.

rri:CurrencyAndAmountType2.description: Currency and Amount Simple Type Combination using an attribute

rri:RprtStrtDt.description: Report Covering Period Start Date and Time.

items.description: List all website that are covered by this report.

rri:RptPrd.description: Report Covering Period. Minimum is 1Month, maximum is one day.

rri:EmailAddress.description: Email Address according to the RFC 882

rri:GamingDeliveryChannelType1.description: Game Delivery Channel from Operator to Player

rri:IPv4Address.description: IPv4 address in dot-decimal notation as defined by IETF Standard. Equivalent to [0-255].[0-255].[0-255].[0-255]

rri:ISODate.description: ISO 8601 Basic and Extended Notations as YYYY-MM-DD

rri:ISODateTime.description: ISO 8601 Basic and Extended Notations as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS in UTC format

rri:ISODuration.description: ISO 8601 Basic and Extended Notations as P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S

rri:ISODurationDay.description: ISO 8601 Basic and Extended Notations as P(n)D

rri:ISODurationMonth.description: ISO 8601 Basic and Extended Notations as P(n)M

rri:TtlAmount.description: Total Amount of the jackpot at the end of the period

rri:JckptAmnt.description: Amount of jackpot at the end of the period

rri:Max140Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 140 chars

rri:Max16Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 16 chars

rri:Max2048Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 2048 chars

rri:Max255Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 256 chars

rri:Max2Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 2 chars

rri:Max35Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 35 chars

rri:Max3Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 3 chars

rri:Max4Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 4 chars

rri:Max70Text.description: Simple Character string datatype with max length of 70 chars

rri:MonetaryAmount.description: Format for representing monetary values. Should be used only in conjuction of with a Currency element or attribute.

rri:DocTp.description: Personal Identification Document Type. See Personal Document ID Types

rri:Id.description: A unique identification that is traceable to a player.

rri:PlayerIdentificationType2.description: Player Identification Information using a goverment issued document.

rri:Id.description: Identification Number issued by operator to trace the player

rri:PlayerUniqueId.description: Player Unique Identification given by operator.

rri:CntctDtl.description: Contact Details of the Account Holder.

rri:CtryOfBirth.description: Country of Birth of Account Holder.

rri:CtryOfRes.description: Country of  Residency if Tp is Individual or Junket. Otherwise Country of Tax Residency if Tp=Corporate.

rri:DoB.description: Date of Birth of Account Holder if Tp is Individual or Junket.

rri:LgnIP.description: IP V4 Address of the  last login.

rri:PersnDtl.description: Personal Details of Account Holder. Applies only if Tp is Individual or Junket. This can only be omitted if TP is Test or Corporate.

rri:PlyrId.description: Player Unique Id as referred to in the Player Managment System.

rri:PlyrTp.description: Type of Player. Important to report test accounts, junkets and corporate players

rri:PstlAddr.description: Postal Address of the Account Holder

rri:PlayerUniqueId.description: Player Unique Identification given by operator.

rri:PlayerTypes1.description: Type of Player for Land Based Gaming

rri:PlayerTypes2.description: Type of Player for all Gaming

rri:PstCd.description: Postal Code used to deliver mail

rri:URL.description: Uniform Resource Locator as defined by IETF and W3C. The format is "scheme:[//authority]path[?query][#fragment]"

rri:WageringStakeType.description: Types of Stake used for wagering

description: JSON Schema generated by Random Systems for Malta Gaming Authority
